creator: Assemblr
descriptionHtml:
Assemblr makes it incredibly easy and fun to create interactive design.

With the help of Augmented Reality (AR) technology, create awesome 3D graphics with photos, videos, and texts in a minute. It’s so simple, even beginners can make something amazing!

Assemblr is the go-to content-creation platform to suit all your needs. Create 3D posters, flyers, catalogs, greeting cards, business cards, picture books, invitations, packagings, and more! You can even preview your work and present it in real-life using Augmented Reality.

Assemblr lets you share your interactive AR design on Instagram story and feed, as well as other social networks. You can also save your design as 3D objects for more purposes: Facebook posts, PowerPoint presentations, 3D printing, and so much more!

Available on all smartphones with supporting PC companion, so you can import or export your design from other softwares anytime, anywhere.

HOW TO USE ASSEMBLR

1. Start with our simple editor
Save your time by picking the best images from our library of 3D objects. From characters, animals, nature, buildings, to fantasy objects — use them as they originally are or transform them into your desired shapes.

2. Insert pictures, texts, or videos
Insert pictures from your device gallery, add videos from Youtube, or write on your projects using 3D texts. Drag and drop items freely into your project with our easy-peasy tools — no tutorials required!

3. Build from blocks if you feel like it
Alternatively, get creative by making your own objects from scratch with our classic editor. Pull up thousands of basic shapes, colors, and textures, then transform them into something amazing.

4. View in Augmented Reality (AR)
Preview your project in real-life using Augmented Reality! Or share it as AR experience using printable & scannable QR markers.

5. Share it to the world!
Share your AR designs directly to Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, email in a minute — or export 3D design as FBX/GLB/STL files for multi-platform usages: AR Facebook posts, 3D PowerPoint presentations, 3D printing, and so much more!

6. Get inspired and inspire others
Get some inspiration by discovering others’ awesome AR projects in the app! Be part of the community by setting up a profile and publish your works in the app. Let the world discover your amazing works!

USE ASSEMBLR FOR EVERYTHING

• For education: presentation, textbook, teaching aid, school project, homework
• For publishing: Augmented Reality book cover, book illustration, packaging, greeting card
• For business: Augmented Reality promo poster, packaging, brochure, catalogue, business card, presentation, resume, company profile, and more
• For events: Augmented Reality birthday cards, school poster, wedding invitations, banners, flyers, art installations, and guides

Get Assemblr now for FREE!

For customer service assistance, send an e-mail to info@assemblrworld.com, or you can find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your thoughts and suggestions:

Website - https://www.assemblrworld.com

Instagram @assemblrworld

Twitter @assemblrworld

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMlHs_KbnPecEBtelIUBpSw

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/assemblrworld/

Community - https://www.facebook.com/groups/assemblrworld/

descriptionHtml:

Assemblr is the go-to content-creation platform to suit all your needs. Create 3D posters, flyers, catalogs, greeting cards, business cards, picture books, invitations, packagings, and more! You can even preview your work and present it in real-life using Augmented Reality.

Assemblr lets you share your interactive AR design on Instagram story and feed, as well as other social networks. You can also save your design as 3D objects for more purposes: Facebook posts, PowerPoint presentations, 3D printing, and so much more!

Available on all smartphones with supporting PC companion, so you can import or export your design from other softwares anytime, anywhere.

HOW TO USE ASSEMBLR

1. Start with our simple editor
Save your time by picking the best images from our library of 3D objects. From characters, animals, nature, buildings, to fantasy objects — use them as they originally are or transform them into your desired shapes.

2. Insert pictures, texts, or videos
Insert pictures from your device gallery, add videos from Youtube, or write on your projects using 3D texts. Drag and drop items freely into your project with our easy-peasy tools — no tutorials required!

3. Build from blocks if you feel like it
Alternatively, get creative by making your own objects from scratch with our classic editor. Pull up thousands of basic shapes, colors, and textures, then transform them into something amazing.

4. View in Augmented Reality (AR)
Preview your project in real-life using Augmented Reality! Or share it as AR experience using printable & scannable QR markers.

Share your AR designs directly to Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, email in a minute — or export 3D design as FBX/GLB/STL files for multi-platform usages: AR Facebook posts, 3D PowerPoint presentations, 3D printing, and so much more!

Assemblr is the go-to content-creation platform to suit all your needs. Create 3D posters, flyers, catalogs, greeting cards, business cards, picture books, invitations, packagings, and more! You can even preview your work and present it in real-life using Augmented Reality.

Assemblr lets you share your interactive AR design on Instagram story and feed, as well as other social networks. You can also save your design as 3D objects for more purposes: Facebook posts, PowerPoint presentations, 3D printing, and so much more!

Available on all smartphones with supporting PC companion, so you can import or export your design from other softwares anytime, anywhere.

HOW TO USE ASSEMBLR

1. Start with our simple editor
Save your time by picking the best images from our library of 3D objects. From characters, animals, nature, buildings, to fantasy objects — use them as they originally are or transform them into your desired shapes.

2. Insert pictures, texts, or videos
Insert pictures from your device gallery, add videos from Youtube, or write on your projects using 3D texts. Drag and drop items freely into your project with our easy-peasy tools — no tutorials required!

3. Build from blocks if you feel like it
Alternatively, get creative by making your own objects from scratch with our classic editor. Pull up thousands of basic shapes, colors, and textures, then transform them into something amazing.

4. View in Augmented Reality (AR)
Preview your project in real-life using Augmented Reality! Or share it as AR experience using printable & scannable QR markers.

5. Share it to the world!
Share your AR designs directly to Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, email in a minute — or export 3D design as FBX/GLB/STL files for multi-platform usages: AR Facebook posts, 3D PowerPoint presentations, 3D printing, and so much more!

6. Get inspired and inspire others
Get some inspiration by discovering others’ awesome AR projects in the app! Be part of the community by setting up a profile and publish your works in the app. Let the world discover your amazing works!

USE ASSEMBLR FOR EVERYTHING

• For education: presentation, textbook, teaching aid, school project, homework
• For publishing: Augmented Reality book cover, book illustration, packaging, greeting card
• For business: Augmented Reality promo poster, packaging, brochure, catalogue, business card, presentation, resume, company profile, and more
• For events: Augmented Reality birthday cards, school poster, wedding invitations, banners, flyers, art installations, and guides

With the help of Augmented Reality (AR) technology, create awesome 3D graphics with photos, videos, and texts in a minute. It’s so simple, even beginners can make something amazing!

Assemblr is the go-to content-creation platform to suit all your needs. Create 3D posters, flyers, catalogs, greeting cards, business cards, picture books, invitations, packagings, and more! You can even preview your work and present it in real-life using Augmented Reality.

Assemblr lets you share your interactive AR design on Instagram story and feed, as well as other social networks. You can also save your design as 3D objects for more purposes: Facebook posts, PowerPoint presentations, 3D printing, and so much more!

Available on all smartphones with supporting PC companion, so you can import or export your design from other softwares anytime, anywhere.

HOW TO USE ASSEMBLR

1. Start with our simple editor
Save your time by picking the best images from our library of 3D objects. From characters, animals, nature, buildings, to fantasy objects — use them as they originally are or transform them into your desired shapes.

2. Insert pictures, texts, or videos
Insert pictures from your device gallery, add videos from Youtube, or write on your projects using 3D texts. Drag and drop items freely into your project with our easy-peasy tools — no tutorials required!

3. Build from blocks if you feel like it
Alternatively, get creative by making your own objects from scratch with our classic editor. Pull up thousands of basic shapes, colors, and textures, then transform them into something amazing.

4. View in Augmented Reality (AR)
Preview your project in real-life using Augmented Reality! Or share it as AR experience using printable & scannable QR markers.

5. Share it to the world!
Share your AR designs directly to Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, email in a minute — or export 3D design as FBX/GLB/STL files for multi-platform usages: AR Facebook posts, 3D PowerPoint presentations, 3D printing, and so much more!

6. Get inspired and inspire others
Get some inspiration by discovering others’ awesome AR projects in the app! Be part of the community by setting up a profile and publish your works in the app. Let the world discover your amazing works!

USE ASSEMBLR FOR EVERYTHING

• For education: presentation, textbook, teaching aid, school project, homework
• For publishing: Augmented Reality book cover, book illustration, packaging, greeting card
• For business: Augmented Reality promo poster, packaging, brochure, catalogue, business card, presentation, resume, company profile, and more
• For events: Augmented Reality birthday cards, school poster, wedding invitations, banners, flyers, art installations, and guides

Get Assemblr now for FREE!

For customer service assistance, send an e-mail to info@assemblrworld.com, or you can find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your thoughts and suggestions:

Website - https://www.assemblrworld.com

Instagram @assemblrworld

Twitter @assemblrworld

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/assemblrworld/

Community - https://www.facebook.com/groups/assemblrworld/

creator: Assemblr
descriptionHtml:
Creating AR in Assemblr Studio is as easy as drag-and-drop. No coding needed. No design skills needed. Simply choose among thousands of 2D & 3D objects, texts, images, and videos, and you’re good to go.

With Assemblr Studio, you can complete all your needs with AR—simply by using our premade templates.

Marketing? Souvenir? Presentation? Product packaging? You choose. Get ready to win big for your brands and companies with AR! No need to create from scratch, feel free to modify them up to your liking.

PREMADE TEMPLATES: No need to create from scratch

• Scroll through our finest choices of premade AR templates.
• Available in four categories to complete your needs: Marketing, Printing, Souvenir, and Presentation (and still counting!).
• Feel free to use it as it is, or modify them up to your liking and purposes.

ALL-IN-ONE EDITOR: Create as simple as drag-and-drop

• Mix and max your creation with thousands of 2D illustrations & 3D objects—bundled in packs.
• Upload custom 3D objects made by you or from the marketplaces.
• Add your own image (pictures or graphics) as ornaments.
• Insert YouTube videos as background music or to detail up your creation.
• Write down more information with 3D texts & annotations.
• Create creative presentations with Scenes.
• Make your creation become much more interactive with Interactivity.

EXPLORE: Get inspired by fellow creators

• Search and discover works & featured templates from your fellow creators on one page.
• Find inspiration from our collaboration projects with IPs, brands, government institutions, and enterprises.

SCAN: Enliven your creation in AR

• Scan your surrounding to see your content pop up.
• Type in your friend’s username, scan the marker, and see it come to life straight in front of you.

SHARE AR: All in a few taps

• Publish your AR and get a sharable link. Share it right away on WhatsApp, Twitter, and Facebook.
• Embed your project code on websites or blogs.
• Visualize your products or brands in 3D easily.

AR MARKERS: Share AR with images

• Share the QR marker of your creation, and scan it to see the experience! No links needed.
• Upload graphics of your book cover, packaging, or any image that you want as a custom marker.
• See your AR coming to life above it!

ASSEMBLR PLANS: Unlock benefits to create better

• Gain exclusive access to all our 3D Pro packs.
• Upgrade your custom 3D storage & custom marker slots.
• Publish your creation in private.Assemblr Studio is an all-around augmented reality app to create, view, and share your AR experiences. We make it simple, easy, and fun!

USE ASSEMBLR STUDIO FOR EVERYTHING

• For education: Presentation, textbook, teaching aid, school project, homework
• For publishing: Augmented reality book cover, book illustration, packaging, greeting card
• For business: Augmented reality promo poster, packaging, brochure, catalog, business card, presentation, resume, company profile, and more
• For souvenirs: Augmented reality t-shirt, tumbler, tote bag
• For events: Augmented reality birthday cards, school posters, wedding invitations, banners, flyers, art installations, and guides

GET CONNECTED!

For customer service assistance, send an e-mail to info@assemblrworld.com, or you can find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your thoughts and suggestions:

Website: assemblrworld.com
Instagram: @assemblrworld
Twitter: @assemblrworld
YouTube: youtube.com/c/AssemblrWorld
Facebook: facebook.com/assemblrworld/
